Sentencas: Since the conduction activation energy of a proton is low, proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H-SOFCs) can work at low temperatures (around 600 degrees C), which is conductive to maintaining the long-term stability of SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: Proton conductor BaCe1-xYxO3-delta is the most commonly used electrolyte material for H-SOFCs, which directly affects the performance of SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: For the purpose of realizing the high-performance BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BCY) proton electrolyte materials for SOFC, the effect of different contents of the transition metal oxide NiO on the performance of proton electrolyte BCY was studied.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: Specifically, BCY-x mol% NiO (named BCY, BCY + 0.5NiO, BCY + 1NiO, BCY + 2NiO, and BCY + 3NiO, when x = 0, 0.5, 1, 2, and 3, respectively) composite electrolyte materials were prepared, and their crystal structures, morphologies, and electrochemical properties were explored.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: The results showed that NiO could effectively improve the density of BCY prepared at 1400 degrees C and enhance the proton conductivity of BCY and the performance of BCY-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: Among them, the BCY + 2NiO electrolyte had good density and the highest proton conductivity, and the SOFC based on the BCY + 2NiO electrolyte had the best electrochemical performance, indicating that the optimal content of the NiO additive was 2 mol% in this case.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO

Sentencas: The results reported in this work are conductive to the realization of high-performance proton electrolyte materials for the SOFC.
Titulo: Performance of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ Proton Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Compositing the Transition Metal Oxide NiO
